mapper.select: SELECT a.CLASS_NAME FROM TB_CLASS a, TB_DEPARTMENT b WHERE a.DEPARTMENT_CODE=b.DEPARTMENT_CODE AND b.DEPARTMENT_NAME=#{className} AND a.CLASS_APPROVE = 'Y'
SELECT CONCAT(DAY,HOUR) AS DAY_HOUR FROM TB_REGISTER_CLASS a,TB_CLASS_TIME b WHERE a.CLASS_SEQ=b.CLASS_SEQ AND a.STUDENT_ID=#{stdId}
SELECT CONCAT(DAY,HOUR) AS DAY_HOUR FROM TB_BASKET_CLASS a,TB_CLASS_TIME b WHERE a.CLASS_SEQ=b.CLASS_SEQ AND a.STUDENT_ID=#{stdId}

SELECT a.CLASS_SEQ, a.CLASS_NAME, c.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS DEPARTMENT_CODE, d.NAME AS PROFESSOR_NAME, subquery1.total, a.ROOM, a.CLASS_TYPE, a.GRADE_SIZE, a.CLASS_LEVEL FROM TB_CLASS a, (SELECT CLASS_SEQ, LISTAGG(CONCAT(DAY, HOUR), '/') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY CLASS_TIME_SEQ ) AS total FROM TB_CLASS_TIME b GROUP BY CLASS_SEQ) subquery1, TB_DEPARTMENT c, TB_PROFESSOR d, TB_REGISTER_CLASS e WHERE subquery1.CLASS_SEQ = a.CLASS_SEQ AND a.CLASS_SEQ = e.CLASS_SEQ AND a.DEPARTMENT_CODE = c.DEPARTMENT_CODE AND a.PROFESSOR_ID = d.PROFESSOR_ID AND e.STUDENT_ID = #{stdId} AND a.CLASS_APPROVE = 'Y'

SELECT a.CLASS_SEQ, a.CLASS_NAME, c.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS DEPARTMENT_CODE, d.NAME AS PROFESSOR_NAME, subquery1.total, a.ROOM, a.CLASS_TYPE, a.GRADE_SIZE, a.CLASS_LEVEL FROM TB_CLASS a, (SELECT CLASS_SEQ, LISTAGG(CONCAT(DAY, HOUR), '/') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY CLASS_TIME_SEQ ) AS total FROM TB_CLASS_TIME b GROUP BY CLASS_SEQ) subquery1, TB_DEPARTMENT c, TB_PROFESSOR d, TB_BASKET_CLASS e WHERE subquery1.CLASS_SEQ = a.CLASS_SEQ AND a.CLASS_SEQ = e.CLASS_SEQ AND a.DEPARTMENT_CODE = c.DEPARTMENT_CODE AND a.PROFESSOR_ID = d.PROFESSOR_ID AND e.STUDENT_ID = #{stdId} AND a.CLASS_APPROVE = 'Y'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_REGISTER_CLASS WHERE STUDENT_ID=#{stdId} AND CLASS_SEQ=#{classSeq}
DELETE FROM TB_BASKET_CLASS WHERE STUDENT_ID=#{stdId} AND CLASS_SEQ=#{classSeq}
